mapper.select: SELECT f.file_id, f.student_id, s.name as student_name, f.file_name, f.original_name, f.file_size, f.file_type, f.file_category, f.upload_time, f.remarks FROM file_upload f LEFT JOIN Student s ON f.student_id = s.student_id WHERE f.is_deleted = 0 AND f.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY f.upload_time DESC
SELECT * FROM file_upload WHERE file_id = #{fileId} AND student_id = #{studentId} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) as totalFiles, COALESCE(SUM(file_size), 0) as totalSize, SUM(CASE WHEN file_category = 'PROPOSAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as proposalCount, SUM(CASE WHEN file_category = 'REPORT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as reportCount, SUM(CASE WHEN file_category = 'THESIS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as thesisCount, SUM(CASE WHEN file_category = 'OTHER' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as otherCount FROM file_upload WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND student_id = #{studentId}
